title: YouTube Video Script Generator
description: Create engaging scripts with high retention
prompt:
Write a script for a YouTube video about [TOPIC].

Style: [Educational/Vlog/Review]
Length: [10 mins]

Structure:
1. Hook (0:00-0:45): The Promise + The Stakes.
2. Intro: Who am I + Why listen.
3. Body Paragraph 1: [Point 1]
4. Body Paragraph 2: [Point 2]
5. Body Paragraph 3: [Point 3]
6. Conclusion: Summary.
7. CTA: Subscribe/Check link.

title: Blog Post Outline & SEO
description: Outline blog posts that rank on Google
prompt:
Create a blog post outline for [KEYWORD].

Intent: [Informational/Commercial]

1. H1 Title (SEO optimized)
2. Meta Description
3. Introduction (PAS framework: Problem-Agitate-Solution)
4. H2 Headers (Key subtopics)
5. H3 Sub-headers
6. FAQ Section (People also ask)
7. Conclusion + CTA

title: Podcast Interview Question Generator
description: Ask deep questions that make guests shine
prompt:
Generate interview questions for a podcast guest.

Guest: [NAME]
Topic: [TOPIC]

Flow:
1. Warm-up (Origin story)
2. The "Meat" (Deep dive into expertise)
3. The Struggle (Failures/Lessons)
4. The Future (Trends/Predictions)
5. Rapid Fire (Fun/Personal)

Avoid generic questions like "Tell us about yourself."

title: Twitter/X Thread Generator
prompt:
Turn this topic into a Twitter thread: [TOPIC].

Hook (Tweet 1): Punchy, controversial, or "How to".
Body (Tweets 2-8): One idea per tweet. Use lists and formatting.
Summary (Tweet 9): Recap key points.
CTA (Tweet 10): "Follow me for more" + Link to newsletter.

title: Content Repurposing Engine
description: Turn one video into 10 pieces of content
prompt:
Repurpose this video transcript into:

1. A LinkedIn post (Professional takeaway)
2. A Twitter thread (Step-by-step)
3. An Instagram Carousel (5 slides text)
4. A Newsletter blurb (Teaser + Link)
5. A Short/Reel script (60s highlight)

Transcript:
[PASTE TRANSCRIPT]

title: Thumbnail Idea Generator
prompt:
Generate 3 thumbnail concepts for a video titled [TITLE].

For each:
1. Visual Description (What's in the image?)
2. Text Overlay (Max 3 words)
3. Facial Expression (Emotion)
4. Color Scheme (Contrast)

Goal: High CTR, curiosity.

title: Hook Library Builder
description: Generate 10 hooks for any piece of content
prompt:
Write 10 hooks for a piece of content about [TOPIC].

Types:
- Negative (Stop doing X)
- Numerical (5 ways to...)
- Secret (The X no one tells you)
- Story (How I...)
- Question (Are you...?)

Make them punchy and under 15 words.
